item.description: A midweek holiday is keeping me home, away from the clan. Is anyone interested in a Christmas Pot Luck Dinner? I'll roast the turkey. RSVP and let's find out- If at my place, I have room for 20+ diners. More if you BYO chair.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Christmas Pot Luck Dinner
